#summary Requirements - 3 big parts

= Requirements =

Here is a parts list of Cloudosys.  You do not have to worry about installing these manually.
  * *Google Gears* http://gears.google.com
  * *YUI* http://developer.yahoo.com/yui/
  * Cloudosys PHP backend - public server: http://www.cloudosys.com/cloudosys/
